mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repeat_schedule( schedule_date, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_place, schedule_title_color ) VALUE( #{scheduleDate}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{schedulePlace}, #{scheduleTitleColor} )
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no as "scheduleNo", schedule_title as "scheduleTitle", schedule_content as "scheduleContent", schedule_place as "schedulePlace", 'repeat' as "repeat" FROM repeat_schedule WHERE schedule_date = #{scheduleDate} ORDER BY schedule_no DESC
